alert.note: Alert for Richmond (Staten Is.) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 12 at 9:20PM EDT until August 12 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline tonight and Saturday Night high tides. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hudson, Eastern Essex and Eastern Union Counties. In New York, Richmond (Staten Island) County. * WHEN...For the first Coastal Flood Statement, until 11 PM EDT this evening. For the second Coastal Flood Statement, Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
